name: Hey, you! Make orders off the shelf!
name_original: Hey, you! Make orders off the shelf!
description:
This game was made for Trijam #172! The theme is: Off the shelf.

Description

You are an employee of a gear sorting shop. Your chief requires you to make orders off the shelf! How much can you make on this and how long will you put up with it?

The rules of the game


In this box you have to put what your chief wants.

In this box you have to put what doesn't fit. Watch out! If you mix up the boxes, your chief will be displeased!

Controls

To put a gear into the store box or into the trash box, use the left and right arrow keys or the "A" and "D" keys. You can also play on the gamepad using the LB and RB.

Credits

Graphics, music, sounds and code made by PhysicalFace.

Enjoy the game! My score is $535. How much will you score?
